data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Darby, Michael (2017): Erro gen. n. a new genus of featherwing beetles (Coleoptera: Ptiliidae) from Angola and Madagascar. Zootaxa 4299 (1): 137-140, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4299.1.10|9 occurrences
